paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on TTR gene variants, including penetrance data and individual case details.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In patients with ATTRv, TTR tetramer destabilization is caused by the incorporation of pathogenic variant subunits into TTR heterotetramers.

functional_data.summary: The Val122Ile variant leads to destabilization of the TTR tetramer, promoting amyloid fibril formation.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, segregates with disease in families.
variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on multiple studies.
variants.additional_notes: The penetrance of the Val122Ile variant is still under investigation.
key_quotes: The prevalence of the Val122Ile (p.Val142Ile) pathogenic variant, the most common in the USA, was approximately 3% among African Americans.
In patients with ATTRv, TTR tetramer destabilization is caused by the incorporation of pathogenic variant subunits into TTR heterotetramers.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data regarding TTR variants and penetrance were successfully extracted.
